text: Dudley Sutton (6 April 1933 â€“ 15 September 2018) was an English actor. He was born in Kingston upon Thames, Surrey, England.Dudley Sutton obituary, The Guardian, 16 September 2018. Retrieved 16 September 2018. He was known for his roles in Rotten to the Core (1965), Crossplot (1969), The Devils (1971), Madame Sin (1972), The Pink Panther Strikes Again (1976), Fellini's Casanova (1976), Edward II (1991), and The Football Factory (2004). Sutton died of cancer on 15 September 2018 in London at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Actors from Surrey
title: Dudley Sutton
